data.title: We Got Hoops - ABC's NBA Theme song by Robert Randolph & the Family Band
data.meta_description: One of my favorite bands recorded the new theme song for ABC's NBA coverage! Robert Randolph and the Family Band are a great group. He plays pedal...
data.text:
Welcome! Please take a few seconds to create your free account to post threads, make some friends, remove a few ads while surfing and much more. ClutchFans has been bringing fans together to talk Houston Sports since 1996. Join us!

One of my favorite bands recorded the new theme song for ABC's NBA coverage! Robert Randolph and the Family Band are a great group. He plays pedal steel guitar and they formed out of a church in New Jersey (I think).. Anyway, check these guys out! They are inspiring!

Actually, I would classify them as gospel..

http://www.artistdirect.com/music/artist/card/0,,1086020,00.html

Sorry for the double post. It just cracked me up that anyone would think they are rednecks..

http://www.robertrandolph.net/look/thumbs.html?07212001

Dude, Robert Randolph and the Family band RULES!!! He is a freaking wizard on that steel guitar. I first heard him on the Bonaroo compilation, and since then he's been popping up all over the place. I haven't yet heard the ABC song -- I'll have to keep my eyes and ears open for it.
